subtitle.subtitle: Even for a Parisian firefighter.
subtitle.translation: Even for a Parisian firefighter.

subtitle.subtitle: It is an emblem for the capital itself, if not the world.
subtitle.translation: It is an emblem for the capital itself, if not the world.

subtitle.subtitle: We came out of Les Halles tunnel,
subtitle.translation: We came out of Les Halles tunnel,

subtitle.subtitle: where the exit is right in front of the cathedral,
subtitle.translation: where the exit is right in front of the cathedral,

subtitle.subtitle: and at that moment, I saw that the spire was completely ablaze,
subtitle.translation: and at that moment, I saw that the spire was completely ablaze,

subtitle.subtitle: engulfed by flames,
subtitle.translation: engulfed by flames,

subtitle.subtitle: and it was something quite remarkable.
subtitle.translation: and it was something quite remarkable.

subtitle.subtitle: [in English] Fire crews from across Paris have come here
subtitle.translation: [in English] Fire crews from across Paris have come here

subtitle.subtitle: to save whatever they possibly can.
subtitle.translation: to save whatever they possibly can.

subtitle.subtitle: And the striking thing,
subtitle.translation: And the striking thing,

subtitle.subtitle: standing among the crowds on the banks of the Seine,
subtitle.translation: standing among the crowds on the banks of the Seine,

subtitle.subtitle: is just the silence,
subtitle.translation: is just the silence,

subtitle.subtitle: the quiet of people stunned by the destruction
subtitle.translation: the quiet of people stunned by the destruction

subtitle.subtitle: of not just a great French cultural artifact,
subtitle.translation: of not just a great French cultural artifact,

subtitle.subtitle: but of one that belonged to the world.
subtitle.translation: but of one that belonged to the world.

subtitle.subtitle: [Henri in French] It's just a building,
subtitle.translation: [Henri in French] It's just a building,

subtitle.subtitle: but we were there every night…
subtitle.translation: but we were there every night…

subtitle.subtitle: and so it was our home.
subtitle.translation: and so it was our home.

subtitle.subtitle: It was hard because we can't do anything.
subtitle.translation: It was hard because we can't do anything.

subtitle.subtitle: That's what's hard.
subtitle.translation: That's what's hard.

subtitle.subtitle: Sorry.
subtitle.translation: Sorry.

subtitle.subtitle: Excuse me.
subtitle.translation: Excuse me.

subtitle.subtitle: It's coming back.
subtitle.translation: It's coming back.

subtitle.subtitle: I need a breath.
subtitle.translation: I need a breath.

subtitle.subtitle: I thought I wouldn't cry anymore over it.
subtitle.translation: I thought I wouldn't cry anymore over it.

subtitle.subtitle: [Captain Franck] When I got to the tactical command post,
subtitle.translation: [Captain Franck] When I got to the tactical command post,

subtitle.subtitle: that's when they give me the mission of saving the artifacts,
subtitle.translation: that's when they give me the mission of saving the artifacts,

subtitle.subtitle: and more specifically, rescuing the Crown of Thorns.
subtitle.translation: and more specifically, rescuing the Crown of Thorns.

subtitle.subtitle: It is a mission that is unusual.
subtitle.translation: It is a mission that is unusual.

subtitle.subtitle: It was something new for me.
subtitle.translation: It was something new for me.

subtitle.subtitle: [Officer Fabrice] My dad often took me to visit the Cathedral,
subtitle.translation: [Officer Fabrice] My dad often took me to visit the Cathedral,

subtitle.subtitle: and so, as a young boy,
subtitle.translation: and so, as a young boy,

subtitle.subtitle: I had seen paintings, sculptures.
subtitle.translation: I had seen paintings, sculptures.

subtitle.subtitle: But I had no idea
subtitle.translation: But I had no idea

subtitle.subtitle: that it was the Crown of Thorns preserved in Notre-Dame.
subtitle.translation: that it was the Crown of Thorns preserved in Notre-Dame.

subtitle.subtitle: [Hubert] We were extremely afraid that it would be crushed…
subtitle.translation: [Hubert] We were extremely afraid that it would be crushed…

subtitle.subtitle: that it would disappear in this fire.
subtitle.translation: that it would disappear in this fire.

subtitle.subtitle: So it was a great anguish.
subtitle.translation: So it was a great anguish.

subtitle.subtitle: I prayed to the Virgin Mary,
subtitle.translation: I prayed to the Virgin Mary,

subtitle.subtitle: for her to protect this absolutely priceless relic.
subtitle.translation: for her to protect this absolutely priceless relic.

subtitle.subtitle: [Frédéric] Christ's Crown of Thorns
subtitle.translation: [Frédéric] Christ's Crown of Thorns

subtitle.subtitle: is more important than Notre Dame Cathedral,
subtitle.translation: is more important than Notre Dame Cathedral,

subtitle.subtitle: which we can rebuild anyway.
subtitle.translation: which we can rebuild anyway.

subtitle.subtitle: It was essential to save it.
subtitle.translation: It was essential to save it.

subtitle.subtitle: [Captain Franck] I am given a whole list of artifacts that are inside,
subtitle.translation: [Captain Franck] I am given a whole list of artifacts that are inside,

subtitle.subtitle: which were located with a map.
subtitle.translation: which were located with a map.

subtitle.subtitle: On this map, the main one was missing.
subtitle.translation: On this map, the main one was missing.

subtitle.subtitle: The Crown of Thorns.
subtitle.translation: The Crown of Thorns.

subtitle.subtitle: The idea being that, since it was so precious,
subtitle.translation: The idea being that, since it was so precious,

subtitle.subtitle: we don't want to explain where it is,
subtitle.translation: we don't want to explain where it is,

subtitle.subtitle: and so we don't show it in any document.
subtitle.translation: and so we don't show it in any document.

subtitle.subtitle: Without knowing where it is precisely, we're going to find it.
subtitle.translation: Without knowing where it is precisely, we're going to find it.

subtitle.subtitle: [Officer Fabrice] It was like nothing I've ever experienced
subtitle.translation: [Officer Fabrice] It was like nothing I've ever experienced

subtitle.subtitle: in my life as a firefighter.
subtitle.translation: in my life as a firefighter.

subtitle.subtitle: It was raining ash.
subtitle.translation: It was raining ash.

subtitle.subtitle: And the smell of burnt wood,
subtitle.translation: And the smell of burnt wood,

subtitle.subtitle: it was as if you were dealing with a forest fire.
subtitle.translation: it was as if you were dealing with a forest fire.

subtitle.subtitle: And this roof that could potentially collapse on us at any moment.
subtitle.translation: And this roof that could potentially collapse on us at any moment.

subtitle.subtitle: [in English] Firefighters continue to try and fight the flames,
subtitle.translation: [in English] Firefighters continue to try and fight the flames,

subtitle.subtitle: but their efforts seem absolutely powerless
subtitle.translation: but their efforts seem absolutely powerless

subtitle.subtitle: in the face of the magnitude of the fire.
subtitle.translation: in the face of the magnitude of the fire.

subtitle.subtitle: [Captain Franck in French] We needed to act quickly.
subtitle.translation: [Captain Franck in French] We needed to act quickly.

subtitle.subtitle: We looked under the altars,
subtitle.translation: We looked under the altars,

subtitle.subtitle: we tried to look behind paintings,
subtitle.translation: we tried to look behind paintings,

subtitle.subtitle: chairs and tables.
subtitle.translation: chairs and tables.

subtitle.subtitle: We didn't know exactly where to look.
subtitle.translation: We didn't know exactly where to look.

subtitle.subtitle: [In English] Fire broke out when the church was closing to visitors.
subtitle.translation: [In English] Fire broke out when the church was closing to visitors.

subtitle.subtitle: Flames burst through the roof,
subtitle.translation: Flames burst through the roof,

subtitle.subtitle: and now, thick, heavy smoke drifts over the heart of Paris,
subtitle.translation: and now, thick, heavy smoke drifts over the heart of Paris,

subtitle.subtitle: as flames ravage the Notre Dame Cathedral.
subtitle.translation: as flames ravage the Notre Dame Cathedral.

subtitle.subtitle: Countless priceless artifacts and artwork are threatened.
subtitle.translation: Countless priceless artifacts and artwork are threatened.

subtitle.subtitle: Notre Dame includes the Crown of Thorns.
subtitle.translation: Notre Dame includes the Crown of Thorns.

subtitle.subtitle: Were that to be lost,
subtitle.translation: Were that to be lost,

subtitle.subtitle: that would be devastating to the Christian world.
subtitle.translation: that would be devastating to the Christian world.

subtitle.subtitle: [in French] We finally found it behind a glass frame,
subtitle.translation: [in French] We finally found it behind a glass frame,

subtitle.subtitle: a golden crown made of thorns.
subtitle.translation: a golden crown made of thorns.

subtitle.subtitle: And at that moment, we were able to remove the Crown of Thorns.
subtitle.translation: And at that moment, we were able to remove the Crown of Thorns.

subtitle.subtitle: When you fulfil the mission you've been given,
subtitle.translation: When you fulfil the mission you've been given,

subtitle.subtitle: it's satisfying knowing that
subtitle.translation: it's satisfying knowing that

subtitle.subtitle: it was really crucial to the operation to save the treasure.
subtitle.translation: it was really crucial to the operation to save the treasure.

subtitle.subtitle: However, the celebrations were short-lived.
subtitle.translation: However, the celebrations were short-lived.

subtitle.subtitle: I came out of the sacristy,
subtitle.translation: I came out of the sacristy,

subtitle.subtitle: and it was there that I learned
subtitle.translation: and it was there that I learned

subtitle.subtitle: the crown was in fact a display copy.
subtitle.translation: the crown was in fact a display copy.

subtitle.subtitle: FIREFIGHTERS PARIS
subtitle.translation: FIREFIGHTERS PARIS

subtitle.subtitle: It wasn't the real one.
subtitle.translation: It wasn't the real one.

subtitle.subtitle: So we had to go on the offensive again
subtitle.translation: So we had to go on the offensive again

subtitle.subtitle: in search of the crown.
subtitle.translation: in search of the crown.

subtitle.subtitle: The real one.
subtitle.translation: The real one.

subtitle.subtitle: [President Macron] So it burns.
subtitle.translation: [President Macron] So it burns.

subtitle.subtitle: It is burning and I know this sadness.
subtitle.translation: It is burning and I know this sadness.

subtitle.subtitle: This inner trembling felt by so many of our fellow citizens.
subtitle.translation: This inner trembling felt by so many of our fellow citizens.

subtitle.subtitle: But tonight, I also want to talk about hope.
subtitle.translation: But tonight, I also want to talk about hope.

subtitle.subtitle: Above all, I want to say a few thoughts and thanks
subtitle.translation: Above all, I want to say a few thoughts and thanks

subtitle.subtitle: for the firefighters in Paris.
subtitle.translation: for the firefighters in Paris.

subtitle.subtitle: Nearly 500 of them have been fighting for several hours
subtitle.translation: Nearly 500 of them have been fighting for several hours

subtitle.subtitle: against the flames and are still fighting.
subtitle.translation: against the flames and are still fighting.

subtitle.subtitle: There was a knowledge that there was something unique in the cathedral
subtitle.translation: There was a knowledge that there was something unique in the cathedral

subtitle.subtitle: that we could not lose, that could not burn,
subtitle.translation: that we could not lose, that could not burn,

subtitle.subtitle: that there are people who, perhaps at the risk of their lives,
subtitle.translation: that there are people who, perhaps at the risk of their lives,

subtitle.subtitle: have gone to find that which needed to be saved.
subtitle.translation: have gone to find that which needed to be saved.

subtitle.subtitle: [Captain Franck] The cathedral manager arrived.
subtitle.translation: [Captain Franck] The cathedral manager arrived.

subtitle.subtitle: They told us that it was in a safe.
subtitle.translation: They told us that it was in a safe.

subtitle.subtitle: But he was a little bit shocked by the situation,
subtitle.translation: But he was a little bit shocked by the situation,

subtitle.subtitle: and struggled to explain to us exactly where this safe was.
subtitle.translation: and struggled to explain to us exactly where this safe was.

subtitle.subtitle: I remembered that there was a grey box
subtitle.translation: I remembered that there was a grey box

subtitle.subtitle: that I initially thought was a transformer.
subtitle.translation: that I initially thought was a transformer.

subtitle.subtitle: I said, "Maybe that's it."
subtitle.translation: I said, "Maybe that's it."

subtitle.subtitle: [Captain Franck] This safe worked with a code made on several locks.
subtitle.translation: [Captain Franck] This safe worked with a code made on several locks.

subtitle.subtitle: I evidently asked the manager for this code.
subtitle.translation: I evidently asked the manager for this code.

subtitle.subtitle: It was pretty chaotic at the time, and he was…
subtitle.translation: It was pretty chaotic at the time, and he was…

subtitle.subtitle: unable to remember this infamous code.
subtitle.translation: unable to remember this infamous code.

subtitle.subtitle: We needed to find another way to open the safe.
subtitle.translation: We needed to find another way to open the safe.

subtitle.subtitle: [Captain Franck] I contacted the command post
subtitle.translation: [Captain Franck] I contacted the command post

subtitle.subtitle: to ask for machinery to break open the safe.
subtitle.translation: to ask for machinery to break open the safe.

subtitle.subtitle: But in the meantime, the manager managed to get the code,
subtitle.translation: But in the meantime, the manager managed to get the code,

subtitle.subtitle: and finally, the safe could be opened…
subtitle.translation: and finally, the safe could be opened…

subtitle.subtitle: and the Crown of Thorns was able to be withdrawn,
subtitle.translation: and the Crown of Thorns was able to be withdrawn,

subtitle.subtitle: just as the grinders were about to make their first cut.
subtitle.translation: just as the grinders were about to make their first cut.

subtitle.subtitle: The fire had just been defeated, barely.
subtitle.translation: The fire had just been defeated, barely.

subtitle.subtitle: The firemen stopped the fire by taking the most extreme risks.
subtitle.translation: The firemen stopped the fire by taking the most extreme risks.

subtitle.subtitle: What we've seen this night in Paris…
subtitle.translation: What we've seen this night in Paris…

subtitle.subtitle: is the capacity to mobilize,
subtitle.translation: is the capacity to mobilize,

subtitle.subtitle: to unite, so we can overcome.
subtitle.translation: to unite, so we can overcome.

subtitle.subtitle: This fire, I daren't say it, but such a dramatic event,
subtitle.translation: This fire, I daren't say it, but such a dramatic event,

subtitle.subtitle: such a horrible event,
subtitle.translation: such a horrible event,

subtitle.subtitle: generates positive things.
subtitle.translation: generates positive things.

subtitle.subtitle: The fire at Notre-Dame allowed the French to realize
subtitle.translation: The fire at Notre-Dame allowed the French to realize

subtitle.subtitle: how lucky they were to have the Crown of Thorns in France.
subtitle.translation: how lucky they were to have the Crown of Thorns in France.

subtitle.subtitle: I think so. I think so.
subtitle.translation: I think so. I think so.

subtitle.subtitle: [Olivier] It is indeed another chapter in this long history.
subtitle.translation: [Olivier] It is indeed another chapter in this long history.

subtitle.subtitle: The firefighters knew they were not simply saving a building,
subtitle.translation: The firefighters knew they were not simply saving a building,

subtitle.subtitle: but were saving something from the soul of France
subtitle.translation: but were saving something from the soul of France

subtitle.subtitle: and the soul of Christianity.
subtitle.translation: and the soul of Christianity.

subtitle.subtitle: [narrator in English] Next on Mysteries of the Faith…
subtitle.translation: [narrator in English] Next on Mysteries of the Faith…

subtitle.subtitle: For thousands of years,
subtitle.translation: For thousands of years,

subtitle.subtitle: relics have been believed to perform miracles.
subtitle.translation: relics have been believed to perform miracles.

subtitle.subtitle: [woman 1 in Italian] I don't think I can explain what happened.
subtitle.translation: [woman 1 in Italian] I don't think I can explain what happened.

subtitle.subtitle: I believe that the Holy Face saves my life every day.
subtitle.translation: I believe that the Holy Face saves my life every day.

subtitle.subtitle: [woman 2 in English] What could be more powerful,
subtitle.translation: [woman 2 in English] What could be more powerful,

subtitle.subtitle: a sign that God is at work, than that?
subtitle.translation: a sign that God is at work, than that?
